description: RugVista Group AB operates as a direct-to-consumer online platform that sells carpets and rugs through its online stores. The company is headquartered in Limhamn, Skane. The company went IPO on 2021-03-18. The firm offers direct-to-consumer online platforms within rug sales via its online stores using the RugVista and CarpetVista brands. The Company’s operations are divided into three segments: B2C, B2B, as well as Marketplaces & Other.
name: Rugvista Group AB (publ)
